channel.title: GP: Songs for the Dusk, Roommates Wanted, Stonetop
channel.description:
On the newest episode @Sandy and I talk with @Mads about these games, using multiple ttrpgs to tell one story, *Lapvona* , life, Twitter, and more.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/songs-for-the-dusk-roommates-wanted-stonetop https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-podcast-index.html
